scripts.clean: dotenv -e .env.dev -- cross-var rimraf %DIST_DIR% && dotenv -e .env.prod -- cross-var rimraf %DIST_DIR%
scripts.docker-build: npm run build && dotenv -e .env.prod -v DIST_DIR=.dist_prod_template.tmp -v FRONTEND_URL=PLACEHOLDER___FRONTEND_URL___PLACEHOLDER -v BACKEND_URL=PLACEHOLDER___BACKEND_URL___PLACEHOLDER -- npm run build && dotenv -e .env.prod -- cross-var docker build -t %DOCKER_IMAGE_NAME%:%VERSION% -f build.docker --build-arg DIST_DIR=%DIST_DIR% --build-arg TEMPLATE_DIST_DIR=.dist_prod_template.tmp . && rimraf .dist_prod_template.tmp
scripts.docker-force-remove: npm run docker-stop && dotenv -e .env.prod -- cross-var node build_utility/ignore_exit_value.js docker container rm %DOCKER_CONTAINER_NAME%
scripts.docker-recreate: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-force-remove && dotenv -e .env.prod -- cross-var docker container create -i -t -p %DOCKER_HTTP_PORT%:80 --name %DOCKER_CONTAINER_NAME% %DOCKER_IMAGE_NAME%:%VERSION%
scripts.docker-rerun: npm run docker-recreate && dotenv -e .env.prod -- cross-var docker container restart %DOCKER_CONTAINER_NAME%
scripts.docker-stop: dotenv -e .env.prod -- cross-var node build_utility/ignore_exit_value.js docker container stop %DOCKER_CONTAINER_NAME%
scripts.start:desktop: npm run generate-manifest:dev && office-addin-debugging start .manifest_dev_generated.xml desktop
scripts.start:web: npm run generate-manifest:dev && office-addin-debugging start .manifest_dev_generated.xml web
